blogPost.excerpt: DPO-as-a-Service at Legal Nodes is 5 times more efficient than a DPO in-house. The monthly package includes: ○ designation of a DPO at your company; ○ 2 requests from your users; ○ 2 30-min consultations; ○ a tailored GDPR roadmap; ○ 3 document templates.
blogPost.body: DPO-as-a-Service at Legal Nodes is 5 times more efficient than a DPO in-house. The monthly package includes: ○ designation of a DPO at your company; ○ 2 requests from your users; ○ 2 30-min consultations; ○ a tailored GDPR roadmap; ○ 3 document templates.
blogPost.title: DPO as a Service - GDPR compliance with DPO as a Service
blogPost.author: Margarita Sivakova

localize.description: 法律节点的DPO即服务比内部的DPO效率高5倍。每月套餐包括 在您的公司指定一名DPO；○2个用户的请求；○2个30分钟的咨询；○一个量身定做的GDPR路线图；○3个文档模板。
法律節點的DPO即服務比內部的DPO效率高5倍。每月套餐包括 在您的公司指定一名DPO；○2個用戶的請求；○2個30分鐘的諮詢；○一個量身定做的GDPR路線圖；○3個文檔模板。

previous.title: FaceCode 2.0 - The best coding interview tool ever built

localize.description: FaceCode是有史以来最智能的编码面试工具。它能帮助面试官轻松、快速、准确地做出客观的招聘决定。
localize.tagline: 史上最好的编码面试工具

localize.description: FaceCode是有史以來最智能的編碼面試工具。它能幫助面試官輕鬆、快速、準確地做出客觀的招聘決定。
localize.tagline: 史上最好的編碼面試工具

next.excerpt: Skizzle is a chrome extension for Gmail that makes end-to-end encryption dead easy - No passwords to remember, share or manage - Send encrypted attachments to any Gmail address - Verify file access on a public blockchain - Generous Free Forever plan
next.title: Skizzle - End-to-end encrypted attachments in Gmail

localize.description: Skizzle是Gmail的chrome扩展，让端到端加密变得简单--无需记忆、分享或管理密码--向任何Gmail地址发送加密附件--在公共区块链上验证文件访问--慷慨的免费永久计划。
Skizzle是Gmail的chrome擴展，讓端到端加密變得簡單--無需記憶、分享或管理密碼--向任何Gmail地址發送加密附件--在公共區塊鏈上驗證文件訪問--慷慨的免費永久計劃。
